reviewText: When I bought this video on Ebay, I was thrilled with it. It is 60 minutes jam-packed with two of Sharon, Lois & Bram's best Elephant Show episodes! The songs are great too! Great tape to pop into the VCR while you are trying to cook dinner and kids are bothering you. It'll keep your little ones engaged throughout. An excellent video. Buy this one as well as the other 11 in this "Elephant Show" video series!
